name: Bounce: A Classic Style Arcade Game
name_original: Bounce: A Classic Style Arcade Game
description:
What is Bounce?

As the name suggests, Bounce: A Classic Style Arcade Game is heavily inspired by arcade classics such as Pong. 


How To Play

Use the arrow keys to move the four paddles up and down. The goal of the game is to try and keep the ball on the screen for as long as possible. The longer you last, the faster the ball will move.
